author: Lesley Waters
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. In a food processor blend together the butter and sugar until pale. Add the eggs and lemon zest and blend to combine. Add the self-raising flour and ground almonds. Pulse with the blender until just combined. Mix the apples and the sponge mix and place into a greased, small, deep, oven-proof frying pan. Place in the the oven for 15 minutes, or until risen and golden brown. Serve dusted with icing sugar and drizzled with cream.
ingredients: 110g/4oz butter,  110g/4oz caster sugar,  zest of 1 lemon,  2 free-range eggs, beaten,  55g/2oz self-raising flour,  55g/2oz ground almonds,  2 apples, each halved and cut into eight pieces,  icing sugar,  double cream
